title: Resveratrol Reduces Oxidative Stress and Apoptosis in Podocytes via Sir2-Related, Enzymes, Sirtuins1 (SIRT1)/Peroxisome Proliferator-Activated Receptor gamma Co-Activator 1 alpha (PGC-1 alpha) Axis
